alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Lake; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:47AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Dyer, Obion and southern Lake Counties through 215 AM CST... At 147 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cottonwood Grove, or 8 miles east of Caruthersville, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union City, Fulton, Reelfoot Lake State Park, Tiptonville, South Fulton, Ridgely, Troy, Obion, Miston, Clayton, Cloverdale, Cottonwood Grove, Hornbeak, Woodland Mills, Samburg, Cat Corner, Wynnburg, Glass, Hathaway and Roneys Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
